data.title: Bill Nunn

data.text:
The late Bill Nunn portrayed Joseph "Robbie" Robertson in Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2 and Spider-Man 3.

Significant roles[]

Radio Raheem in Do the Right Thing (1989)

Duh Duh Duh Man in New Jack City (1991)

Bradley in Regarding Henry (1991)

Lt. Eddie Souther in Sister Act (1992)

Harlan in The Last Seduction (1994)

Easy Wind in Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead (1995)

Terrence "Pip" Phillips in The Job (2001-2002)

Joe Musto in Firehouse Dog (2007)

Bobo in A Raisin in the Sun (2008)

Quotes[]
